content: Do any of you Viet Vets have photos of Dong Tre Special Forces Camp A-222 or Trung Luong Village- Operation Nathen Hale, June 19-23 1966. or have info. for same. Mt.Mongoose
reply: Do any of you Viet Vets have photos of Dong Tre Special Forces Camp A-222 or Trung Luong Village- Operation Nathen Hale, June 19-23 1966. or have info. for same. Mt.Mongoose
title: Dong Tre SF Camp/Battle for Trung Luong

content: You might try one of these: *http://www.carrscompendiums.com/ccSEA/Documents/AD0391694/AD0391694_I16.html *http://www.classmates.com/registration/military/installation.jsp?stateId=971&overseas=true *http://www.thespecialforce.com/Camps/camps.htm A listening ear, a caring heart, an open mind and an extend hand may be all I can offer, but they are yours without charge or judgment.
